description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability in Windows Task Scheduler (CVE-2024-49039):

1. Download and apply the necessary updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your system version. 
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: KB5046617
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5046633
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5046613
   - Windows 10 for x64 and 32-bit Systems: KB5046665

2. Follow the installation prompts provided during the update process.

3. Restart your system to ensure that all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- These KB updates address the improper authentication vulnerability identified as CWE-287 that could lead to potential elevation of privilege within the Windows Task Scheduler.
- For manual installation, access the update packages through these links:
   - [KB5046613](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)
   - [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
   - [KB5046665](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system matches one of the specified versions of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
